about.title: About Our Story
about.description: Intrigue your culinary senses with our authentic Italian menu, prepared by Chef Luca Annunziata. Each dish hand crafted, featuring many dishes straight from the streets of Naples, Italy. Select from the lighter side such as soup and salad, shared appetizers or delectable entrées. Pair your meal with an elegant wine, house infused cocktail or a gourmet coffee drink.
